verbose_text: Consistent with this, the expressions of the oligodendrocytic lactate transporter monocarboxylate transporter 1 (SLC16A1) was decreased in the spinal cords of patients with ALS and SOD1 G93A mice suggesting abnormalities in lactate transfer.
